document.full_text: the fbi on friday is investigating more than three dozen suspicious letters containing a white powdery substance sent to schools in the capital area, leading authorities to race across the city to check for possible threats.
document.title: fbi probes white powder in letters sent to dc schools
lines_and_colors: the fbi on friday is investigating more than three dozen suspicious letters containing a white powdery substance sent to schools in the capital area, leading authorities to race across the city to check for possible threats.
